text:
EMOTIONAL
Staywell staterooms / meditation / breathwork / sound therapy

SOCIAL
bathhouse experience / group yoga, pilates / sound baths / beauty bar / grooming rituals

INTELLECTUAL
curated library of books, educational seminars, shows & podcasts about the latest & greatest in wellness, health and healing

PHYSICAL
bootcamp / personal trainers / group classes / massages & bodywork

NUTRITIONAL
healthy eating / cooking classes / nutritional consultations / Chinese herbal medicine / herbal teas / healthy spa beverages and snacks

CLINICAL
advanced anti-ageing therapies / sports clinic / acupuncture for well-being / pain management

content.name: Emotional
text: Emotional well-being grounds us in the present. From mindfulness exercises to creative meditation programs, our group classes, in-room tutorials and integrated breathwork in every service forces us to take a moment for ourselves.

content.name: Social
text: Wellness is a group effort. When we surround ourselves with those who enrich us--be it old friends and life loves or new friends, we grow and learn from each interaction. Everyday, No. 12 offers a variety of group classes and social spaces to connect and re-connect with those around us.

content.name: Intellectual
text: The open seas encourage open thinking. Be inspired by one of our educational seminars, listen to interesting philosophical, cultural, historical and wellness focused Podcasts, or watch interesting, mind expanding documentaries in your Stateroom. Stop by our Heywood Hill curated lounge and browse from the latest releases including Candice Millard’s Hero of The Empire: The Making of Winston Churchill to Andrew Solomon’s Far and Away: How Travel Can Change the World, Chronicle of a lifetime’s travels & experiences.

content.name: Physical
text: Work hard, play hard. No. 12’s Physical program encompasses a wide-range of one-on-one training and sessions with group classes from leading brands such as Pure BarreTM and PelotonTM.

Massage and Body Therapy.
From straight up Swedish massage to the poetic Thousand Flower Detoxifying Wrap, guests can check in and then check out.

Group Classes: Step in, Be bold.
Engage the body in a variety of functional movements, build muscle and strength. Be it yoga, pilates, stretch therapy or barre, be a part of the team effort to achieve strong hearts and beautiful bodies.

Fitness Centre: Build strength, one step at a time.
Our signature tness centre features a high-intensity circuit program built around intervals, strength and T3 conditioning. Practiced by the top athletes worldwide, this proprietary program will allow you to achieve your highest goals.

content.name: Nutritional
text: Foods feed the mind and the soul. No.12 pays considered attention to all elements of the food experience pairing services with creative and globally-inspired beverages and light food items. Our signature wellness inspired tea program served everyday offers our specially-blended teas inspired by the various Cunard voyages alongside sweet and savoury delights all made with health and nutrition in mind, but no compromise on taste. The perfect afternoon indulgence.

content.name: Clinical
text: The most cutting-edge, anti-ageing treatments offered on the seas. Consult with our top physicians, acupuncturists and aestheticians to achieve your anti-ageing and wellness goals with instant results and little to no recovery time.
